text: was a Japanese politician and gymnast. She competed at the 1960 and 1964 Olympics and won a team bronze medal in 1964. On 13 March 2021 Ono died from COVID-19 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tokyo Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Japanese politicians Category:Japanese gymnasts Category:People from Miyagi Prefecture
title: Kiyoko Ono
